Additionally, "make you do something embarrassing" and "encourage you to open up" may not be appropriate ways to support or encourage our partners. Instead, it's important to prioritize mutual respect, trust, and open communication in a relationship.

* Encourage you to express yourself freely - Girlfriend
* Listen attentively to what you have to say - Husband
* Make an effort to get to know your family - Girlfriend
* Be excited to spend time with you - Husband
* Support your goals and dreams - Girlfriend
* Offer constructive feedback in a kind way - Husband
* Respect your boundaries and personal space - Girlfriend
* Show appreciation for the things you do - Husband

I hope this revised list better reflects positive and respectful ways to interact with a romantic partner.
